result.markdown:
<details><summary>See R code</summary>





::: {.callout-tip}


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
annual_hi_gross_tours <-
  ind_html[[9]] |>
  clean_names()
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
annual_hi_gross_tours_clean <-
  annual_hi_gross_tours |>
  dplyr::mutate(across(
    c(adjusted_gross_in_2022_dollar,
      actual_gross),
    ~ as.numeric(str_replace_all(.x, "[$,]", ""))
  ),
  year = lubridate::ymd(year, truncated = 2L),
  decade = as.factor(floor_date(year, years(10))))
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
annual_hi_gross_tours_clean |>
  ggplot(aes(
    x = year,
    y = adjusted_gross_in_2022_dollar,
    size = shows,
    fill = decade
  )) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5,
             shape = 21,
             color = "black") +
  geom_smooth(aes(group = decade)) +
  scale_size(range = c(0, 4)) +
  scale_fill_viridis(discrete = TRUE,
                     guide = FALSE,
                     option = "A") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    legend.position = "none",
    text = element_text(size = 9,
                        family = "lato"),
    title = element_text(size = 16,
                         family = "abril-fatface"),
    panel.background = element_blank(),
    axis.ticks.x = element_blank(),
    axis.text.x = element_blank(),
    axis.title.x = element_blank(),
    axis.title.y = element_blank()
  ) +
  labs(title = "Annual highest-grossing tours")
```

```{.r .cell-code}
annual_hi_gross_tours_clean |>
  ggplot(aes(
    x = shows,
    y = adjusted_gross_in_2022_dollar,
    fill = decade
  )) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5,
             shape = 21,
             color = "black") +
  scale_size(range = c(0, 4)) +
  scale_fill_viridis(discrete = TRUE,
                     guide = FALSE,
                     option = "A") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    legend.position = "none",
    text = element_text(size = 9,
                        family = "lato"),
    title = element_text(size = 16,
                         family = "abril-fatface"),
    panel.background = element_blank(),
    axis.ticks.x = element_blank(),
    axis.text.x = element_blank(),
    axis.title.x = element_blank(),
    axis.title.y = element_blank()
  ) +
  labs(title = "Number of shows vs. income")
```
